actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-298, by Mr. Moakley.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2459 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by title. Bill is open to amendments. It shall be in order to consider the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries now printed in the bill as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 69.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2459) to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard for fiscal year 1990, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2459 (Coast Guard).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2459) to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard for fiscal year 1990, and for other purposes.
